1_16mtXSvjVc32hJMHM4fdxaY6Lkeip3vesA.body: 历史上，高尔基的一些经历和郭先生比较类似。高尔基一开始是支持苏共的，和列宁一起并肩作战，后来发现了苏共也有凶残的一面，开始反对，最后和列宁闹翻离开了俄国，但是由于高尔基的世界影响力，列宁一直没有处理他，知道列宁去世后，斯大林和苏共其他人争夺苏共最高权利的时候，大家都开始拉拢高尔基，一个是他是“为穷人发声”的大文豪，一个是他在伦敦存有苏共内部“黑材料”。最后斯大林打败了其它人，高尔基回归成为他的肉喇叭，最后，大清洗开始……

> [c0der](#comment_1_1puKtcLtsbvEgJQPqRfBDWhjES2GboEDN): It is a rumor there, and another picture which Fang Binxing (the initial developer of GFW) denied this in Wechat, but the denial seems fake.The talk to the Shadossocks developer make her left and delete project. Currently it is maintained by others (source code can be backtracked in project's commitments and forked project). It also have a branch named SSR, which is stronger.I do believe GFW will eventually have the skill to recognize and block Shadowsocks, as long as they gather enough information (with machine learning?). Even this rumor is fake, it's better to keep multiple tool to meet the worst case.The worst case will be government disconnect China from global Internet. At that time, any tools will become useless, even Shadowsocks.

Yes, if government want to launch a movement of great purge, the door will be closed quickly. However China need internet to support it's enconomy now. The goverment also need to attract foreign company investment to get $. The door can not be closed completely. All they want now is to deprive the freedom of chinese people to access internet. It's too bad ... :(
